infos.title: Captivating Demon
infos.like: Anything that strikes interest or curiosity
infos.story: This playful and bewitching succubus acts on her own whims. As expected of her Demon lineage, she is a hedonist driven by what she finds fun and enjoyable. Even during the Demon War, she chose traveling around on her own over joining the invasion. In her eyes, fighting alongside Kyle was interesting enough for her to even betray her own kind. When she later met Kasel, she gladly joined his party, knowing that she found another fun adventure for herself. When she finds attractive men, she sometimes visits them in their dreams.

uw.name: The Seductress, Guillotine
uw.description: Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing (0) of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by (1) ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
uw.story: A deadly scythe that matches the characters of its wielder, Epis. It reaps the souls of those who approach it to admire its beauty. Created from within Epis's own body, the weapon is much like a succubus itself. It delivers extreme pleasure to its victims before absorbing their life energy. It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.

1.description: [Absorbing Blow] Increases DMG by (0) and upon killing an enemy, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec. ATK increase effect can be stacked up to max 3 times.
1.story: Epis's favorite liquor. The most notorious liquor in Orvel, it is made from the strongest wormwood and can cause people to hallucinate. It is secretly used by artists to stoke their inspiration or as a cure for bad cases of insomnia. For Epis, however, it's a light, easy drink.

2.story: Box containing the Nightmare Queen's sand of sleep. A box from the Demon World that contains magic sand that causes one to fall asleep. When the enemy falls asleep, attacks the enemy and deals M. DMG through a nightmare that cannot be dispelled.

3.name: Seductress Shoes
3.description: [Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG is increased by (0).
3.story: Epis's treasured item. When Epis first arrived in the human world, she really got into human culture and attended a masquerade. The dancing of a girl wearing red heels caught her eyes, and she made a deal with her in exchange for the those shoes. Epis wears her seductive heels and get carried away when inflicting pain on her enemies with her dance.

4.name: Memory of Dream

4.story: A magical mirror that reflects the dreams Epis has absorbed. Since Epis has been using the mirror to store interesting dreams, it is now filled with countless traces of the deepest of secrets.

advancement.1: Activation chance is changed to 30%, and DMG is increased by 50%.
advancement.2: The M.DMG now ignores Block, and increases the M.DMG the hit enemy takes by 30% for 7 sec.

sw.story:
Guillotine was born from Epis, and it grew as her strength and will grew stronger.
Through the Trial of Souls, Guillotine broke its limit as a tool with a fixed shape, and took a form of two scythes in order to harvest more souls and pleasure.
Painless death and eternal pleasure await those enchanted by Guillotine's seductive appearance.
